channel.title: Zenithscape source help!
channel.description: So, I have tried port forwarding and searched all the files for relative keywords like, IP, SETTINGS, HOST, LOADER, LAUNCHER, LAUNCH, RUN... All sorts. so we can't seem to find how to change the IP of the SERVER. not the client, the SERVER. The client was put to my IP and then ran it with the server up, and it won't connect like that either, So we just need to change the ip what the server runs on.

item.title: Zenithscape source help!
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

want some extremely useful help. dont use zenithscape source…so much is wrong with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Zenithscape source help!
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

There is no server IP. I’m using the same source, fixing all the bugs and what not.
MAKE SURE YOU HAVE A NO-IP. Make sure the No-ip is running, and check your portforwarding. Thats where everyones problem is.
Here is a spoon-feed on the details:
The source runs off of your computer/mac/linux.
The client (The thing that connects to your server) Has to connect to the internet, find your modem, connect to your modem, then to your router, then check if port 43594 is open, and then connect to your computer, and connect to the server.
If any one this of those is wrong, it will not work.

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=portforwarding+help

Read full topic
